means: 广域网中的一种高速链路

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词都可表示"勇气，胆量"之意。
means: courage ： 普通用词。指面对危险或困难时无所畏惧的精神和敢于奋斗的进取心。
bravery ： 指在危险中表现出的无所畏惧精神或在逆境中仍能坚持下去的毅力。
backbone ： 指性格倔强，意志坚定，有骨气，有顽强的决心去做某事。
nerve ： 侧重指面临危险或在冒险的情况下具有冷静、清醒的头脑和坚定无畏的勇气。

word_mean: 脊柱：背中线一连续的比较强直的骨结构，同columna vertebralis〔NA〕

sentence.Network_en: Petty officers are the backbone of a navy.
Agriculture forms the backbone of the rural economy.
sentence.Network_cn: 农业是农村经济的基础。

sentence.Network_en: The wounded soldiers showed much backbone before the enemy.
sentence.Network_cn: 受伤的士兵在敌人面前表现出了威武不屈的精神.

entry.def: Your backbone is the column of small linked bones down the middle of your back.
The backbone of an organization or system is the part of it that gives it its main strength.

example.ex: The small business people of Britain are the economic backbone of the nation.
example.tran: 英国的小商人是国家经济的支柱。

entry.def: If you say that someone has no backbone, you think they do not have the courage to do things which need to be done.

example.ex: You might be taking drastic measures and you've got to have the backbone to do that.
example.tran: 你也许要采取极端的措施，你必须有勇气那么做。

means.word_mean: 1. a central cohesive source of support and stability;

sentences.sentence: "the keystone of campaign reform was the ban on soft money"
"he is the linchpin of this firm"
"he didn't have the guts to try it"

means.word_mean: 3. the series of vertebrae forming the axis of the skeleton and protecting the spinal cord;
4. the part of a network that connects other networks together;

sentences.sentence: "the backbone is the part of a communication network that carries the heaviest traffic"

auth_sentence.content: Communities connect to the backbone like all ISP's.

auth_sentence.content: Press down with the knife, cutting through the backbone.

means.word_mean: 骨干,支柱,主力,中坚,基础

sentences.en: Agriculture used to be the economic backbone of this country.
sentences.cn: 农业曾是这个国家的经济支柱。

sentences.en: More and more people are deciding that political power must be the backbone of every new advance.
sentences.cn: 越来越多的人认为,政治权力是每前进一步的保证。

sentences.en: The wounded soldiers showed much backbone before the enemy.
sentences.cn: 受伤的士兵在敌人面前表现出了威武不屈的精神。

sentences.en: Standing up to bullies takes plenty of backbone.
sentences.cn: 勇敢地对付暴徒需有大无畏精神。
